MESSAGE.JP: に小毬さんと一緒に乗った列車に乗り、小毬さんと一緒に降りた駅で降りる。
MESSAGE.EN: Like the other day, I took the same train that Komari-san and I had used, and reached the same station at which we had gotten off together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like the other day, I took the same train that Komari-san and I had used, and reached the same station at which we had gotten off together.

MESSAGE.JP: 車が通り過ぎていくと、途端に耳に大きくなる雨音。
MESSAGE.EN: As the train left, the sound of the rain took over the landscape.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the train left, the sound of the rain took over the landscape.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（雨なんて、止めばいいのに…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wish it'd stop raining right now...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wish it'd stop raining right now...)

MESSAGE.JP: 色の空を見上げて、そう思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought, looking up to the murky gray sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought, looking up to the murky gray sky.

MESSAGE.JP: が厚い雲を吹き払って、そこから光が差し込めば、あの屋上は本当にステキな場所になるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If only a wind had blown away those thick clouds and the sun had shed its light on that roof again, it would have been a wonderful place.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only a wind had blown away those thick clouds and the sun had shed its light on that roof again, it would have been a wonderful place.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…ようし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...All right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...All right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: く頷いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I made a strong nod to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made a strong nod to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 雨くらいで陰鬱になってる場合じゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I had no time to let the rain bother me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I had no time to let the rain bother me.

MESSAGE.JP: 設で貸してもらった傘を開いて、駅を後にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I opened the umbrella I had borrowed from the nursing home and left the station.
MESSAGE.Translation: I opened the umbrella I had borrowed from the nursing home and left the station.

MESSAGE.JP: 次郎さんのメモを頼りに、その場所を目指して歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: Checking out the note given by Kojirou-san, I made my way to where the instructions pointed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Checking out the note given by Kojirou-san, I made my way to where the instructions pointed.

MESSAGE.JP: らない町で、すれ違う人もいない。
MESSAGE.EN: The town was strange to me, and no one passed me on the streets.
MESSAGE.Translation: The town was strange to me, and no one passed me on the streets.

MESSAGE.JP: は、ひとりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was all alone now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was all alone now.

MESSAGE.JP: う一度、ふたりで歩くことが出来たなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If I could walk together with Komari-san once again...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I could walk together with Komari-san once again...

MESSAGE.JP: そのときは、雨だってなんだって、きっと笑い飛ばして歩いていけるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We would surely be able to laugh away even this rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We would surely be able to laugh away even this rain.

MESSAGE.JP: は歩く足を速めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hastened my pace.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hastened my pace.

MESSAGE.JP: の墓地。
MESSAGE.EN: I arrived at the graveyard under the heavy downpour.
MESSAGE.Translation: I arrived at the graveyard under the heavy downpour.

MESSAGE.JP: 月のこの時期に、ここを訪れる人も少ないのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I guessed that very few people visited here this time of June.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guessed that very few people visited here this time of June.

MESSAGE.JP: 石の灰色よりも、背の高い雑草の緑が多く目に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: My diagnosis was based on the tall weeds I saw growing here and there in the yard.
MESSAGE.Translation: My diagnosis was based on the tall weeds I saw growing here and there in the yard.

MESSAGE.JP: 元の砂利を一歩一歩踏みしめながら、その墓石たちをひとつひとつ確認していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Treading carefully, I checked out each one of the gravestones.
MESSAGE.Translation: Treading carefully, I checked out each one of the gravestones.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（あった…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(There it is...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(There it is...)

MESSAGE.JP: 利からは雑草がいくつか顔を出し、燭台には完全に溶けてしまった蝋がこびりついている。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed there was a stump of a completely melted candle on the pricket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed there was a stump of a completely melted candle on the pricket.

MESSAGE.JP: かが僕の前にここを訪れたのだろうか、花だけは取り替えられていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It looked like somebody had come to visit here before me and replaced the flowers.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looked like somebody had come to visit here before me and replaced the flowers.

MESSAGE.JP: げられているのは、菊の黄色い花。
MESSAGE.EN: The flowers were yellow chrysanths.
MESSAGE.Translation: The flowers were yellow chrysanths.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はその前に立つ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I stood in front of the grave.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I stood in front of the grave.

MESSAGE.JP: 也さんの眠る場所。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the place where Takuya-san was sleeping.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the place where Takuya-san was sleeping.

MESSAGE.JP: 分、今まで…一番小毬さんの事を思っていた人が、ここに眠っている。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have been the one person who loved Komari-san more than anybody else in the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have been the one person who loved Komari-san more than anybody else in the world.

MESSAGE.JP: は手を合わせて、目を伏せた。
MESSAGE.EN: I joined my palms and closed my eyes in supplication.
MESSAGE.Translation: I joined my palms and closed my eyes in supplication.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（拓也さん…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Takuya-san...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Takuya-san...)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（小毬さんが、笑顔を失くしかけています…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Komari-san is about to lose her smile...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Komari-san is about to lose her smile...)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（僕はどうすればいいんですか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What can I do about it...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What can I do about it...?)

MESSAGE.JP: 何も返ってはこない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was no answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was no answer.

MESSAGE.JP: っと…拓也さんがいれば、それで小毬さんの呪縛を解くことが出来るんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps... if he had been alive, he would have been able to set her free from what was binding her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps... if he had been alive, he would have been able to set her free from what was binding her.

MESSAGE.JP: も、拓也さんは、もう小毬さんに何もしてあげられない…。
MESSAGE.EN: But Takuya-san was not here, nor was there anything more he could do for his sister...
MESSAGE.Translation: But Takuya-san was not here, nor was there anything more he could do for his sister...

MESSAGE.JP: からこそ、こんな事が起こっているんじゃないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: That is why such things were happening...
MESSAGE.Translation: That is why such things were happening...

MESSAGE.JP: 実って、どうしてこんなに残酷なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why was the reality so cruel?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was the reality so cruel?

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんと、拓也さんのふたりが残した、楽しい記憶を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled the many pleasant memories of the Kamikita siblings she had shared with me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled the many pleasant memories of the Kamikita siblings she had shared with me.

MESSAGE.JP: どうやっても、それは二度と還ってこないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Those days would never come back.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Those days would never come back.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「一体、なにを探しに来たんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What on earth did I come here for...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What on earth did I come here for...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: わず、そう呟いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I murmured to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I murmured to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: あの世の存在なんて信じてないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't believe in another world where dead people would go.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't believe in another world where dead people would go.

MESSAGE.JP: し、拓也さんが『そこ』から僕たちの事を見ていたとしたら、きっと同じもどかしさを感じているだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: But if Takuya-san had been watching us from ❝up there❞ he must've shared my frustration over not being able to do anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: But if Takuya-san had been watching us from ❝up there❞ he must've shared my frustration over not being able to do anything.

MESSAGE.JP: をしたことも、顔も知らない人が生きていてくれたら、なんて思うことは初めてだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had never wished in my entire life for somebody whose face I didn't even know to still be alive.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had never wished in my entire life for somebody whose face I didn't even know to still be alive.

MESSAGE.JP: 拓也さんが遺したのは…結局、悲しみだけだったってことじゃないのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...In the end, all he had left was... nothing but sorrow, wasn't it...?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...In the end, all he had left was... nothing but sorrow, wasn't it...?

MESSAGE.JP: うしようもなかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This had been unavoidable.
MESSAGE.Translation: This had been unavoidable.

MESSAGE.JP: う、誰にだって…どうしようもなかったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There had been nobody who could have done anything about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: There had been nobody who could have done anything about it.

MESSAGE.JP: れはわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: I did understand that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did understand that.

MESSAGE.EN: Nevertheless...
MESSAGE.Translation: Nevertheless...

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんには、拓也さんの存在が大きすぎるんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san had depended too much on Takuya-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san had depended too much on Takuya-san...

MESSAGE.JP: れようとしたって、忘れられないくらいには…。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence even if she tried to forget about him, she couldn't...
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence even if she tried to forget about him, she couldn't...

MESSAGE.JP: のにわとりとひよこの絵本だって…。
MESSAGE.EN: That book about a chicken and a chick was the proof...
MESSAGE.Translation: That book about a chicken and a chick was the proof...

MESSAGE.JP: し、拓也さんがいたら、どうするだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What would Takuya-san do?
MESSAGE.Translation: What would Takuya-san do?

MESSAGE.JP: こにいて、あの小毬さんを見たら…どうするだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: What would he do if he were alive and saw his sister right now?
MESSAGE.Translation: What would he do if he were alive and saw his sister right now?

MESSAGE.JP: とつ、気がついた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: There was just one thing that came to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was just one thing that came to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: っとそれが、僕のやるべき事なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And that must have been what I was supposed to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: And that must have been what I was supposed to do.

MESSAGE.JP: うし、と頷いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: All right, I told myself with a nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right, I told myself with a nod.

MESSAGE.JP: ここにいる僕が、自分でしなきゃいけないことなんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was something I had to deal with by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was something I had to deal with by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: も、糸口すら見つからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I didn't even know where to begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I didn't even know where to begin.

MESSAGE.JP: した傘から、いくつも雨粒が落ちていった。
MESSAGE.EN: One after another, raindrops were falling from my umbrella.
MESSAGE.Translation: One after another, raindrops were falling from my umbrella.

MESSAGE.JP: その雨粒の先に。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Through those falling raindrops
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Through those falling raindrops

MESSAGE.JP: がひとつ、見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw another umbrella.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw another umbrella.

MESSAGE.JP: あの後ろ姿は…。
MESSAGE.EN: That silhouette...
MESSAGE.Translation: That silhouette...

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「謙吾…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: はそのまま、雨の向こうに消えていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The umbrella faded away into the rain.
MESSAGE.Translation: The umbrella faded away into the rain.

MESSAGE.JP: 見間違えだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Did I get the wrong person?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Did I get the wrong person?

MESSAGE.JP: いかけてみたが、その後ろ姿に追いつくことは出来なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to catch up to him, but couldn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to catch up to him, but couldn't.

MESSAGE.JP: もそも、謙吾が今ここにいるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: In the first place, it's not like Kengo could be here now.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the first place, it's not like Kengo could be here now.

MESSAGE.JP: う一度、振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned around.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned around.

MESSAGE.JP: 也さんの眠る場所を、真正面に見据える。
MESSAGE.EN: And I focused on where Takuya-san was sleeping.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I focused on where Takuya-san was sleeping.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…探して見ます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll figure it out...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll figure it out...❞

MESSAGE.JP: う、『彼』に告げて、来た道を戻る事にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I told him and turned back the way I had come.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told him and turned back the way I had come.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「僕に出来ること…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'll figure out what I can do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'll figure out what I can do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 偉そうなことを言っておいて、そんなの全然思いつかない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Although I'd made that bold declaration, I was low on ideas.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Although I'd made that bold declaration, I was low on ideas.

MESSAGE.JP: も、僕が何かしなきゃ、小毬さんはこんなことを繰り返して…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I really had to do something so that this wouldn't keep happening to Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I really had to do something so that this wouldn't keep happening to Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: のまま壊れてしまうかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: If I left her alone, she could be broken beyond repair.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I left her alone, she could be broken beyond repair.

MESSAGE.JP: 対嫌だ、そんなの。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't want to let that happen, ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't want to let that happen, ever.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（小毬さんを縛り付けてるのは、お兄さんの想いだ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What chains her must be her feelings toward her brother...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What chains her must be her feelings toward her brother...)

MESSAGE.JP: 想から、解き放ってあげないといけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I needed to release her from her illusions.
MESSAGE.Translation: I needed to release her from her illusions.

MESSAGE.JP: のとき、僕がその悲しみを受け止める。
MESSAGE.EN: And to make her accept the ensuing grief.
MESSAGE.Translation: And to make her accept the ensuing grief.

MESSAGE.JP: きるだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Could I really do that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could I really do that...?

MESSAGE.JP: 自身だって、そこから抜けきれていないのに。
MESSAGE.EN: Given that even I had still not fully come to terms with my parents' deaths, I couldn't be too confident.
MESSAGE.Translation: Given that even I had still not fully come to terms with my parents' deaths, I couldn't be too confident.

MESSAGE.JP: に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I arrived back at our dorm room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I arrived back at our dorm room.

MESSAGE.JP: 人は今日も謙吾のところに泊まる、と書置きがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a note from Masato saying [I'm staying at Kengo's room again].
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a note from Masato saying [I'm staying at Kengo's room again].

MESSAGE.JP: 僕自身がやらなきゃいけないことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I really was grateful to him.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really was grateful to him.

MESSAGE.JP: とりで考えられるのは、むしろありがたいことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I wanted to think about the problem alone in peace.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I wanted to think about the problem alone in peace.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…さて）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Well.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Well.)

MESSAGE.JP: 考えるのは、救われないマッチ売りの少女。
MESSAGE.EN: I was thinking of the little match girl, whom nobody had cared to help.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was thinking of the little match girl, whom nobody had cared to help.

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんが語っていた、小毬さんの絶対に好きになれない、物語。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san had told me she could never like the story.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san had told me she could never like the story.

MESSAGE.JP: 空の中で、少女が見たのは、一筋の流れ星。
MESSAGE.EN: Up in a cold sky, the little girl saw a shooting star.
MESSAGE.Translation: Up in a cold sky, the little girl saw a shooting star.

MESSAGE.JP: 女はそれをみて、自分のおばあさんの言葉を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: And she remembered the words her deceased grandmother had told her.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she remembered the words her deceased grandmother had told her.

MESSAGE.JP: 星が一つ、
MESSAGE.EN: ❝When a star falls
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝When a star falls

MESSAGE.JP: れ落ちるとき、
MESSAGE.EN: it means someone has died
MESSAGE.Translation: it means someone has died

MESSAGE.JP: が一つ、
MESSAGE.EN: and their soul
MESSAGE.Translation: and their soul

MESSAGE.JP: さまのところへと引き上げられるのよ』。
MESSAGE.EN: is ascending to God.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: is ascending to God.❞

MESSAGE.JP: んなシーン、僕が知っているマッチ売りの少女には入っていなかったと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't think that part had been included in the version of the Little Match Girl I had read.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't think that part had been included in the version of the Little Match Girl I had read.

MESSAGE.JP: ぶん、子供向けの絵本なんかでは、わかりづらい、という理由でカットされているんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: That bit had probably been omitted because it was kind of hard for children to understand.
MESSAGE.Translation: That bit had probably been omitted because it was kind of hard for children to understand.

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんがお兄さんに聞かせてもらってたのは、きっときちんと全部書かれたものだったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The story Komari-san told me must have been the unabridged version.
MESSAGE.Translation: The story Komari-san told me must have been the unabridged version.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「魂が、神様のところに、か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Souls ascending to God...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Souls ascending to God...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 女はそれに気付いていなかったけど、そのとき『引き上げられた』魂は、少女のものに他ならない。
MESSAGE.EN: I imagined in my mind how, unbeknownst to the little girl, the soul which ascended to heaven at that time was hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I imagined in my mind how, unbeknownst to the little girl, the soul which ascended to heaven at that time was hers.

MESSAGE.JP: して、少女が最期にどれだけ美しい、温かいものを見たとしても。
MESSAGE.EN: And it didn't matter how beautiful and warm what she saw right at her last moment was,
MESSAGE.Translation: And it didn't matter how beautiful and warm what she saw right at her last moment was,

MESSAGE.JP: 笑みながら死んでいったとしても。
MESSAGE.EN: or even if she passed away with a smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: or even if she passed away with a smile.

MESSAGE.JP: れが幸福な物語ならば…少女を『可哀想』なんて表現したりはしない。
MESSAGE.EN: If the story were a happy one... nobody would look upon what happened to her with pity.
MESSAGE.Translation: If the story were a happy one... nobody would look upon what happened to her with pity.

MESSAGE.JP: れはつまり、悲しい話だっていうことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, the story was a sad one.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, the story was a sad one.

MESSAGE.JP: 救いなんてなかった、ということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...There was no one who even tried to help her out.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...There was no one who even tried to help her out.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…だったら）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Then.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Then.)

MESSAGE.JP: ったら、僕が助けてあげればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I would help her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would help her.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰も見向きもしなかった』少女に、僕が…救いの手を差し伸べてあげればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I would give a helping hand to that girl whom nobody had even deigned to pay attention to.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would give a helping hand to that girl whom nobody had even deigned to pay attention to.

MESSAGE.JP: ういう話に、すればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I would create a story like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would create a story like that.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、拓也さんがしなかったこと。
MESSAGE.EN: That was what Takuya-san had left undone.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was what Takuya-san had left undone.

MESSAGE.JP: しいことなんて、本当はなくしてしまえればいい。
MESSAGE.EN: I really wished everything that was sad in reality could just disappear.
MESSAGE.Translation: I really wished everything that was sad in reality could just disappear.

MESSAGE.JP: くならないなら…僕が救いになればいいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: But I knew that was impossible... so I would be the one to help.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I knew that was impossible... so I would be the one to help.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…そんなことで、救えるんだろうか）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Can I really do it?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Can I really do it?)

MESSAGE.JP: らにあった、拓也さんの絵本を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look at the picture book Takuya-san had drawn.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look at the picture book Takuya-san had drawn.

MESSAGE.JP: 表紙はぐちゃぐちゃで、中も湿って波打ち始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The cover had gotten all wet, and so had the sheets within.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The cover had gotten all wet, and so had the sheets within.

MESSAGE.JP: ど、拓也さんの名前は油性ペンで書いてあったのか、くっきりと残っている。
MESSAGE.EN: However, Takuya-san's signature on the cover was still clear because it was written with oil-based ink.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, Takuya-san's signature on the cover was still clear because it was written with oil-based ink.

MESSAGE.JP: これは拓也さんの描いたものなんだと、そう伝えている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The sign was irrefutable proof of who had created the book.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The sign was irrefutable proof of who had created the book.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（これを描いたとき…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder...)

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（拓也さんは、もう死を覚悟していたんだろうか…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Was he already preparing for death when he was making the book...?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Was he already preparing for death when he was making the book...?)

MESSAGE.JP: れていってしまうのが悲しい、と小毬さんは言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san said it was painful to be forgotten.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san said it was painful to be forgotten.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@（…拓也さんが、そんなことを描いたのか？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Is that really what he had wanted to tell her?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Is that really what he had wanted to tell her?)

MESSAGE.JP: とそんな疑問が浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: That doubt passed through my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: That doubt passed through my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: れは、死の床に伏してまで、小毬さんを心配していた、拓也さんが作った本。
MESSAGE.EN: This was a book that Takuya-san had finished on his deathbed, worrying about his little sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was a book that Takuya-san had finished on his deathbed, worrying about his little sister.

MESSAGE.JP: 毬さんだけのために、作られた絵本だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was a book just for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was a book just for her.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな本が、『悲しい』だけのものなんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Could that kind of book really be about nothing but sadness?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Could that kind of book really be about nothing but sadness?

MESSAGE.JP: は絵本を手に取り、読み返してみた。

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うう～、緊張するなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uuu, I'm so nervous...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uuu, I'm so nervous...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹君は、なんだか私に会わせたい人がいるみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: He had said he wanted me to meet someone.
MESSAGE.Translation: He had said he wanted me to meet someone.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰なのかは内緒らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But he didn't tell me who it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But he didn't tell me who it was.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いやまあ、別にそんな肩肘張らなくてもさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you don't have to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you don't have to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「誰かわからないのは緊張するよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝How could I not? I don't even know who I'm going to meet～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝How could I not? I don't even know who I'm going to meet～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当は小毬さんも知ってる人だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, you do know them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, you do know them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うーん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 像を巡らせてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to puzzle it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to puzzle it out.

MESSAGE.JP: わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But I still had no idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But I still had no idea.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…家族、なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What if they were family?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What if they were family?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「りきくん、もももしかして私のおとうさんおかあさんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Are w-w-w-w-we going to see my father and mother!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Are w-w-w-w-we going to see my father and mother!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「そそそんな、いくらなんでもまだ早すぎるし私たちまだ学生だし理樹君と一緒になりますとか云えないしでも結婚とかしてみたいしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I-I-I think it's too early to do that. We are still students, and you can't tell them we are getting married yet, but I do want to marry you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I-I-I think it's too early to do that. We are still students, and you can't tell them we are getting married yet, but I do want to marry you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「違うけど、したいなら別に僕が挨拶に行くくらい、いいんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we're not. But I'm ready to go meet your parents if you're really serious about wanting to marry me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we're not. But I'm ready to go meet your parents if you're really serious about wanting to marry me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うあああああっ、したいけどちがうーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uaaaahhhhh, I am but I'm not!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uaaaahhhhh, I am but I'm not!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ああっ、なに言っても自爆ばっかりだっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Nooo, I totally self-destructed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nooo, I totally self-destructed.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…まあ、まだ先だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Well, there's still a long way to go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Well, there's still a long way to go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「え、先ならするの、結婚？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Eh, until the time when we're going to marry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Eh, until the time when we're going to marry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そ、そりゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I guess...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I guess...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもからかわれてばかりなので、たまにはお返し。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I poked him back a little as a payback for the fact he was always teasing me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I poked him back a little as a payback for the fact he was always teasing me.

MESSAGE.JP: コニコ顔で理樹君の顔を覗き込むと、照れくさそうに顔を反らす。
MESSAGE.EN: I gazed into his face with a grin, and he looked away embarrassedly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gazed into his face with a grin, and he looked away embarrassedly.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「えへへ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ehehe～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ehehe～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹君とのそんなやり取りが、一番楽しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Talking with him like this was the most enjoyable thing in the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Talking with him like this was the most enjoyable thing in the world.

MESSAGE.JP: 楽しいし、嬉しい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was fun and made me happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was fun and made me happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「あ、そうだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, I almost forgot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, I almost forgot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「これ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つも右手に抱えてる絵本。
MESSAGE.EN: I took out the picture book that always accompanied me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took out the picture book that always accompanied me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹君のお手製の絵本だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was the one Riki-kun had written for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was the one Riki-kun had written for me.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、そんなの持ち歩かなくても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You didn't have to bring that along...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You didn't have to bring that along...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「大事なものだもん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝This is something precious to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝This is something precious to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…きっと、ずっと持ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...I'm going to keep it with me for life.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...I'm going to keep it with me for life.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「最後のページね、書き足してみたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I tried doing something with the last page, by the way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I tried doing something with the last page, by the way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん、最後のページなかったし、おしまいってついてなかったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I mean, the page was blank, and the story didn't seem like it was over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I mean, the page was blank, and the story didn't seem like it was over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「最後は私がつくってみました～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So I added the final bit～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So I added the final bit～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…どれどれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Let me see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Let me see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 樹君に最後のページを見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: I showed him the last page.
MESSAGE.Translation: I showed him the last page.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…消えちゃうんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She disappeared, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She disappeared, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「でもね、少し悲しいけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's a little bit sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's a little bit sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「それはきっと、いい終わり方なんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But I believe it's a good ending.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But I believe it's a good ending.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬@「…悲しいだけじゃないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...Because it's not only sad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...Because it's not only sad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: げんそうのおばあさんはやがてきえてしまって、しょうじょはひとりになってしまったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The phantom of her grandmother faded away at the end, and the girl was left alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The phantom of her grandmother faded away at the end, and the girl was left alone.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、しょうじょはいろんなしあわせをみつけて、しあわせにくらしましたとさ…。
MESSAGE.EN: After that she, nevertheless, found a great many wonderful things, and lived her life in happiness...
MESSAGE.Translation: After that she, nevertheless, found a great many wonderful things, and lived her life in happiness...
